text: Nikolai Nikolayevich Evreinov (; February 13, 1879 - September 7, 1953) was a Russian theatre director, dramatist and theatre practitioner. He was associated with the art movement known as Russian Symbolism. == The Storming of the Winter Palace == In 1920, Evreinov organised the mass spectacle The Storming of the Winter Palace. ==Other websites== Category:1879 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Russian theatre directors
title: Nikolai Evreinov
